channel.title: SB 5113 - Concerning cost-of-living adjustments for plan 1 retirees of the teachers' retirement system and public employees' retirement system.

item.title: ❓💵Candice Bock - Association of Washington Cities
item.description: Candice Bock signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Cities. They are a registered lobbyist.
